p:
In addition, we found a negative genetic concordance between PD and the blood levels of PC aa 32:3. PC has an anti-inflammatory role
49 and it is the most abundant glycerophospholipid in eukaryotic membranes where it is involved in lipid homeostasis
50 . Blood levels of PC aa 32:3 have not been studied in PD but decreased levels of other PC species have been observed in plasma from PD patients
51 . This is in keeping with our finding that genetic variants associated with PD contribute to decreased levels of a specific PC species.
